attributes.action: Provide Free Heat Light and Telephone for the Elderly and disabled
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Provide free heat power and telephone  servoces for the elderly and disabled  as is the case in certain other EU countries with a budget a lot smaller than the UK .

The funds for such a scheme could be found by looking at the waste of funds supplied to strange unheard of groups that happen to tickle someones fancy in government circles 

Remember   some day you too will be OLD  and possibly even disabled and unable to pay your heating and lighting bills with the possibility of ending up on the streets , Look after the elderly and disabled people of the country show the government actually cares about us

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
